programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: Chaos descends on Phoenix as two serial killers compete for the media's attention and the bodies pile up faster than the police can investigate.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: Investigators in East Baton Rouge, La., hunt for a serial murderer who carefully carves up and cuts the bodies of his victims after death.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: When multiple victims' bodies are dumped around Louisiana's bayou area, a task force is formed to catch a killer who police believe may have strangled over 20 men.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: Police in Hartford, Conn., investigate a string of ruthless killings in the Asylum Hill area committed by a killer with a devastating mark that leaves his victims nearly unrecognizable.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A serial sniper terrorizes the entire D.C. metro area by discreetly targeting random victims out in public and in plain sight.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: In 1990, a serial killer terrorizes the University of Florida's campus, killing five students in under four days; the Gainesville Ripper leaves behind a crime scene where all the victims have been stabbed but the females have been posed like dolls.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: In New Jersey four bodies are found dismembered, bagged, and thrown in roadside garbage cans; the "Last Call Killer" hunted his victims openly in piano bars but no one suspected he could be hiding in plain sight, working as a local nurse.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: Dallas police discover three women murdered with their eyes surgically removed; police believe they have a deranged doctor on the loose until two rookie cops find themselves on the trail of a man with a talent for taxidermy and a hatred for women.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A killer hijacks the highways of Sacramento as several women are found strangled with their clothing cut into precise but odd patterns; a survivor leads police to a sports car driving deviant posing as a good samaritan to poach potential victims.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: When the Hillside Stranglers are caught police realize they still have another serial killer running rampant in Los Angeles; he tortures and toys with his model victims while keeping pieces of their jewelry as he snaps their last photo ever.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: Texas authorities have a killer riding the rails and leaving a literal trail of bread crumbs after eating at victims' tables; when more murders are linked, the FBI names a Most Wanted suspect and a national manhunt for The Railroad Killer ensues.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: Minnesota police hunt for a killer caller who confesses to a string of murders in a chilling, high-pitched voice, begging for forgiveness; no one can identify him until one woman survives a brutal attack.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: In the summer of 1976, the NYPD are chasing a man shooting at couples in parked cars with a gigantic, .44 caliber handgun; he taunts the city with terrifying letters until police get a lead about a suspect who has shot a neighbor's dog.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: Brooklyn shop keepers are afraid of closing time as a killer shoots his victims while locking up their stores.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: In the 1990's, New York is on edge as a killer leaves coded clues at crime scenes and declares his compulsion to choose victims by their birth signs.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A rash of young men goes missing around Chicago during the 1970s; when bodies start washing up in the river, a pattern emerges; a small piece of evidence leads police to the home of a model citizen, where his furnace puts the suspect in the hot seat.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: Police find a string of murdered women in shallow graves in very remote areas of the Alaskan wilderness; after months of searching, police zero in on a local family man living a double life that no one suspects.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: Numerous women are found dead by the side of the road with a unique ligature that looks like a dog collar and leash; detectives are stumped until a 17-year-old girl manages an escape from a vicious kidnapper, leading police to a serial killer.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: The I-5 corridor in California is taken over by a brazen bandit who terrorizes the highway with a blitz of assaults and murders; the only clue to the killer's identity is a specific athletic tape used to bind his victims.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A serial killer taunts Wichita, Kan., for decades by sending brazen letters and taking credit for horrific kills; at the introduction of the computer era, the killer gets sloppy and accidentally leaves a digital clue.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: In the 1990s, Louisiana is terrorized by multiple serial killers; the Zachary Police Department discovers the key to solving their cases when a pattern emerges with personal items missing from each local victim.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A killer is murdering and mutilating young women along the Route 40 corridor in Delaware, but after investigators set up an undercover operation, the hunter soon becomes the hunted.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: After multiple men are discovered brutally murdered, investigators determine that each victim was last seen with a handsome stranger they met in a bar.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: After a series of women in the Seattle area are found brutally murdered with their bodies posed, police realize that they might have a killer stalking the area nightclub scene who is able to charm his victims into submission.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: Chicago police investigate the murders of several women, whose bodies are discovered in abandoned buildings barefoot.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: Chicago detectives believe that a serial killer is using classified ads to lure and murder his victims.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A killer crisscrosses the Midwest leaving a string of victims along the interstate, but when he realizes investigators are hot on his trail the murderer suddenly changes his mark.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A cold-blooded killer conceals his victims' bodies with trash, discarding them like garbage in the back alleyways of Los Angeles.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A Houston killer taunts the media and authorities as he uses homemade ligatures to murder his victims.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer
programme.desc: El Paso investigators race to track down a ruthless killer who is burying his victims in shallow desert graves, dead or alive.
